      java.lang.String getCalendars(java.lang.String username)
      Selects all calendars the user has access to and puts them into the calendars arraylist in the calendars class The calendars class is then serialized to a json object via gson.

    • Method Detail

      • getCBSCalendar

        public java.lang.String getCBSCalendar(java.lang.String username)
        Reads data from calendar.cbs.dk and deserializes it using gson. Every date is converted from arraylists into dates using SimpleDateFormat Finally the method getCustomEvents is called to add all custom events too
        Parameters:
        username -
        Returns:
        events

      • getCustomEvents

        public java.lang.String getCustomEvents(java.lang.String username,
                               boolean onlyCustomEvents,
                               java.lang.String fromCalendar)
        Selects the users events from the database and adds them to the arraylist events in the events class. Datetimes from the database is made into dates via SimpleDateFormat The SQL queries has been done using sub queries which the querybuilder does not support. Therefore the method doQuery has been used instead.
        Parameters:
        username -
        onlyCustomEvents -
        fromCalendar -
        Returns:
        custom events

      • getCalendars

        public java.lang.String getCalendars(java.lang.String username)
        Selects all calendars the user has access to and puts them into the calendars arraylist in the calendars class The calendars class is then serialized to a json object via gson. The SQL query has been done using sub queries which the querybuilder does not support. Therefore the method doQuery has been used instead.
        Parameters:
        username -
        Returns:
        calendars json
